content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --BODSYS
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --BDSYCD
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000024
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error if --BODSYS is not empty, --BDSYCD is empty
Outcome:
  Message: --BODSYS is not empty and --BDSYCD is empty
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0082
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Events[--BODSYSCD][Variable Qualifier of BODSYS]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --BODSYS
                Section: Events
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0082
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --BODSYS
                Document: Model v1.7
                Section: 2.2.2
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0082
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --BODSYS
                Document: Model v1.4
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error if --BODSYS is not empty, --BDSYCD is empty

Outcome.Message: --BODSYS is not empty and --BDSYCD is empty
